job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: role data scientist with machine learning and python experienceltbrgtlocation remoteltbrgtfulltimecontract w onlyltbrgtltbrgtjdltbrgt years of relevant work experience in data science or related field ltbrgt strong demonstrated understanding of machine learning methods and applied statistical packages as applied to data analysis within open source scripting languages eg r python is required ltbrgt strong demonstrated understanding of data lifecycle required around data ingestion ingest data from disparate systems into cloud computing environment data contextualization merging large data sets developing algorithms to merge and clean data data insights and analytics is required ltbrgt demonstrated skills in building scalable analytical solutions is required ltbrgt ability to quickly develop working knowledge in areas outside of ones expertise ltbrgt handson experience with business applications of distributed computing eg mapreduce hive hadoop is preferred ltbrgt demonstrated experience in setting up and managing data in cloud computing environment aws or ms azure is preferred ltbrgt proven communication and influence skills are requiredltbrgt
